section.p: The template captures details of a human subject's exposure to protocol-specified study treatment. Study treatment may be any intervention that is prospectively defined as a test material within a study, and is typically but not always supplied to the subject.

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="SBADM" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] doseQuantity
The amount of study treatment taken at a single administration. [SDTM: EXDOSE, EXDOSU]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime
Information on when and how oftern the study treatment was taken. Possible values include start date, stop date, and duration. Note, only two of these need to be valued, and only two values are supported. [SDTM: EXSTDTC, EXENDTC, EXDUR, EXDOSFRQ]

SHALL contain [1..2] id
A sponsor supplied reference number for the study treatment. [SDTM: EXSEQ, EXSPID] A sequence number is required.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] routeCode
The route by which the treatment is administered. [SDTM: EXROUTE]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] maxDoseQuantity
Information on the total daily dose of the medication. The structure also accommodates periods other than a day. [SDTM: EXDOSTOT] Note, this attribute can also be used if multiple total dosage amounts need to be reported.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Allows capture of a group identifier for the exposure information.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Group Identifier (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.63)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] consumable
Identifies and carries information for the consumable item that is being referred to.
Contains exactly one [1..1] Consumable Material (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.58)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Indicates a category the exposure information is assigned to.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] exposureCategory with data type exposure Event Category

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Indicates a subcategory the exposure information is assigned to.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] exposureEventSubCategory with data type exposure Event Sub Category

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] text
A text description of the dosing. [SDTM: EXDOSTXT]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] approachSiteCode with data type CE
An indication of the location, e.g. left arm, where the substance was administered. [SDTM: EXLOC]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Records the intended schedule or regimen for the intervention.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type ED
Text description of the intended schedule or regimen for the intervention [SDTM: EXDOSRGM]
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Records the reason for an adjustment to the dosage of the study drug or intervention.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="CAUS"
This entryRelationship Contains exactly one [1..1] doseAdjustmentReason with data type dose Adjustment Reason

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Records the study epoch during which the information was collected.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Study Epoch (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.71)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Used to record the order of the element associated with the exposure within the study arm to which the subject is assigned.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.26.1.1 NCI Thesaurus)
The code value indicates the observation captures an element's order within a trial arm.
This observation SHALL contain zero or more [0..*] value with data type INT
A value that gives the order of an element within the trial arm. [SDTM: TAETORD]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Orients the consumption of the study drug with respect to a study defined timepoint.
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Timing Reference (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.74)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Used to record the study days associated with the beginning and end points of an activity that may extend over a period of time.
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Study Day Period (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.70)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="SBADM" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)

SHALL contain [1..2] id
A sponsor supplied reference number for the study treatment. [SDTM: EXSEQ, EXSPID] A sequence number is required.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] text
A text description of the dosing. [SDTM: EXDOSTXT]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime
Information on when and how oftern the study treatment was taken. Possible values include start date, stop date, and duration. Note, only two of these need to be valued, and only two values are supported. [SDTM: EXSTDTC, EXENDTC, EXDUR, EXDOSFRQ]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] routeCode
The route by which the treatment is administered. [SDTM: EXROUTE]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] approachSiteCode with data type CE
An indication of the location, e.g. left arm, where the substance was administered. [SDTM: EXLOC]

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] doseQuantity
The amount of study treatment taken at a single administration. [SDTM: EXDOSE, EXDOSU]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] maxDoseQuantity
Information on the total daily dose of the medication. The structure also accommodates periods other than a day. [SDTM: EXDOSTOT] Note, this attribute can also be used if multiple total dosage amounts need to be reported.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Group Identifier (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.63)
Allows capture of a group identifier for the exposure information.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] consumable
Contains exactly one [1..1] Consumable Material (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.58)
Identifies and carries information for the consumable item that is being referred to.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Indicates a category the exposure information is assigned to.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] exposureCategory with data type exposure Event Category

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Indicates a subcategory the exposure information is assigned to.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] exposureEventSubCategory with data type exposure Event Sub Category

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Records the intended schedule or regimen for the intervention.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type ED
Text description of the intended schedule or regimen for the intervention [SDTM: EXDOSRGM]
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Records the reason for an adjustment to the dosage of the study drug or intervention.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="CAUS"
This entryRelationship Contains exactly one [1..1] doseAdjustmentReason with data type dose Adjustment Reason

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Study Epoch (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.71)
Records the study epoch during which the information was collected.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Used to record the order of the element associated with the exposure within the study arm to which the subject is assigned.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.26.1.1 NCI Thesaurus)
The code value indicates the observation captures an element's order within a trial arm.
This observation SHALL contain zero or more [0..*] value with data type INT
A value that gives the order of an element within the trial arm. [SDTM: TAETORD]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Timing Reference (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.74)
Orients the consumption of the study drug with respect to a study defined timepoint.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Study Day Period (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.70)
Used to record the study days associated with the beginning and end points of an activity that may extend over a period of time.
